About
Tradition with a Twist
International Influence
Royal Palm Village Wine & Tapas was established in 2011. Kori Blacker Tafoya always aspired to be a restaurateur, with years of experience in wine sales, restaurant management and service. David Joudi of Riverside Liquors was looking to open a second retail store at the beaches. They focused on providing unmatched customer service and expertise in the wine industry while seeking to create a community that brings people together. Inspired by European travel they sought to create an atmosphere which provides a transcendent experience. This would not be possible without a talented chef to make their dreams a reality. In 2011 Chef Chris Robert joined their team.
Contact Us
Seasonally inspired, locally sourced
Chef Chris Roberts
Chris is a classically trained chef with several years’ experience in the culinary arts. During his studies, he focused on the nuances of both French and classic American cuisine. He is a firm believer of sourcing locally and working closely with other small farmers who share in his passion to deliver only the best quality ingredients to their customers. This ensures fresh and flavorful dishes coming from the kitchen to the table.
Raised in New Mexico, Chris immerses himself in preparing very flavorful southwestern and southern cuisine. He is also an avid baker.  His creativity and menu diversity have grown and continues to grow with Royal Palm’s concept.
A Kitchen with Intention
Our Values
Family
Royal Palm is creating  a community that brings friends and family together to share inspired dishes from around the world.
Quality
Not only does Royal Palm hand select  wines from all over the globe, they also use Floridian grown food for a local twist in flavor.
Authenticity
Featuring a scratch kitchen and hand selected wine collection, Royal Palm provides an authentic culinary experience.
Proud of our Jacksonville roots
Invested In Our Community
Kori and David are focused on creating a business that gives back to the community. Invested in local agriculture, their number one priority is to support local farmers. Economic and agricultural growth is a small part of why they choose to work with small Floridian businesses. In addition, Royal Palm regularly hosts and donates to charities and organizations; including, the Child Cancer Fund, MS Society, Chemo Noir, and The Donna Foundation.
What Our Guests Say...

Events
Catering
About
Tour
Contact
Events
Turning Moments to Memories
Private Events
Royal Palm offers a unique experience by providing customized private events on or off site. If looking to host an event at Royal Palm we have daytime availability for private groups when planned in advanced. During the evening hours we have a semi-private area with a capacity maximum of 25 people. To reserve this space on Friday or Saturday evening, there is a minimum spend of $1000 plus tax and gratuity required.
Contact Us
Wine & Craft Beer Tastings
With over 1200 options, professional sommeliers are available to create a tasting based on your unique palette.
Pairing Events
Once the wine is selected, chefs are able to curate a custom menu of hors d'oeuvres to compliment the tasting.
Private Parties
From bachelorette parties to company luncheons, the private dining spaces can be customized to fit any gathering.
14th Anniversary Wine Tasting Festival
ATLANTIC BEACH
11/08/2025 14:00
Join us for Royal Palm’s 14th anniversary Wine Tasting Festival, benefiting the child Cancer Fund.  Celebrate with samplings of over 200 wines, keepsake wine glass, music, draft beer from local…
